title: Is eBay Refurbished a SCAM?
description: Is AliExpress better than Wish?  Testing tech from Back Market:   Subscribe for more!  TikTok:  Instagram:  Twitter:  Threads:   Chapter Titles: 0:00 What is eBay Refurbished? 1:56 ROG Gaming PC 4:20 This Isn't Going Well 5:33 Razer Pro Type Keyboard 7:54 Beyerdynamic DT 770 Pro 10:28 Testing the Gaming Setup 11:03 DJI Osmo Pocket 13:18 iPhone 12 mini 15:19 Skullcandy Headphones 17:45 What a Handheld Console
